text: 2005 FIFA World Youth Championship was held in Netherlands from 10 June to 2 July. == Venues == Doetinchem Emmen Enschede De Vijverberg Univ√© Stadion Arke Stadion Capacity: 12,600 Capacity: 8,600 Capacity: 13,250 Kerkrade Tilburg Utrecht Parkstad Limburg Stadion Willem II Stadion Stadion Galgenwaard Capacity: 19,979 Capacity: 14,637 Capacity: 24,500 == Qualification == The following 24 teams qualified for the 2005 FIFA World Youth Championship. Host country the Netherlands did not have to qualify for the tournament. Confederation Qualifying Tournament Qualifier(s) AFC (Asia) 2004 AFC Youth Championship CAF (Africa) 2005 African Youth Championship CONCACAF (North, Central America and Caribbean) 2005 CONCACAF U-20 Tournament CONMEBOL (South America) 2005 South American Youth Championship OFC (Oceania) 2005 OFC U-20 Championship UEFA (Europe) Host nation UEFA (Europe) 2004 UEFA Under-19 Championship :1.Teams that made their debut. ==Results== RSSSF ===Group stage=== ====Group A==== Team Pld W D L GF GA GD Pts align=left 3 3 0 0 6 1 +5 9 align=left 3 0 2 1 3 4 -1 2 align=left 3 0 2 1 2 3 -1 2 align=left 3 0 2 1 2 5 -3 2 ====Group B==== Team Pld W D L GF GA GD Pts align=left 3 3 0 0 9 4 +5 9 align=left 3 1 1 1 7 6 +1 4 align=left 3 1 1 1 4 4 0 4 align=left 3 0 0 3 2 8 -6 0 ====Group C==== Team Pld W D L GF GA GD Pts align=left 3 3 0 0 13 1 +12 9 align=left 3 2 0 1 7 3 +4 6 align=left 3 1 0 2 7 8 -1 3 align=left 3 0 0 3 0 15 -15 0 ====Group D==== Team Pld W D L GF GA GD Pts align=left 3 2 1 0 2 0 +2 7 align=left 3 2 0 1 3 1 +2 6 align=left 3 1 1 1 2 1 +1 4 align=left 3 0 0 3 0 5 -5 0 ====Group E==== Team Pld W D L GF GA GD Pts align=left 3 3 0 0 6 0 + 9 align=left 3 1 1 1 3 4 -1 4 align=left 3 1 0 2 5 5 0 3 align=left 3 0 1 2 2 7 -5 1 ====Group F==== Team Pld W D L GF GA GD Pts align=left 3 2 1 0 3 0 +3 7 align=left 3 1 1 1 4 2 +2 4 align=left 3 1 0 2 3 5 -2 3 align=left 3 1 0 2 2 5 -3 3 ===Knockout stage=== {{Round16 |||2||3 |||1||0 |||1||2 |||3||0 |||1||0 |||1||3 |||1||0 |||3||0 |||1||2 |||3||1 |||2 (4)||2 (2) |||1 (10)||1 (9) |||1||2 |||0||3 |||2||1 |||2||1 |widescore=yes}} == Final ranking == ==References== Category:2000s in Dutch sport Category:2005 in Europe Category:2005 in association football Category:Football in the Netherlands Category:June 2005 events Category:FIFA World Youth Championship
